QRCode.scanWarning:
Utilizing WeChat to scan the QR code may prove inefficacious.
For iOS, one may employ the camera to facilitate scanning;
For Android, either the camera or browser can be utilized.
Should you encounter difficulties with scanning, you may click the link to authenticate.

notice.announcement:
Requirements for the practical training project:
Students are mandated to accomplish a total of 2 project internships.
In this project internship, the class members will be organized into 5 groups, each of which will undertake the completion of a static webpage project.
The content of project development and the presentation (PPT) will be allocated among group members, with each individual required to furnish an internship report.
Each student is obliged to provide the following materials:
01. Project presentation PPT (may be shared within the group)
02. Project code (may be shared within the group)
03. Internship report (must be submitted individually)
All students must submit the results of 2 projects by the 25th of October.
notice.title: Project Announcement
